steps.title: Python Basics
steps.description: Learn Python syntax, data structures, and basic programming concepts.

steps.title: NumPy & Pandas
steps.description: Master numerical computing and data manipulation with NumPy and Pandas.

steps.title: Machine Learning
steps.description: Understand supervised and unsupervised learning with Scikit-learn.

steps.title: Deep Learning
steps.description: Dive into neural networks using TensorFlow and PyTorch.

steps.title: NLP & Computer Vision
steps.description: Explore natural language processing and computer vision applications.

steps.title: Statistics Fundamentals
steps.description: Learn probability, distributions, and statistical inference.

steps.title: Python for Data Analysis
steps.description: Use Python libraries like Pandas and Matplotlib for data analysis.

steps.title: Data Visualization
steps.description: Create insightful visualizations with Seaborn and Plotly.

steps.title: Predictive Modeling
steps.description: Build predictive models using regression and classification techniques.

steps.title: Big Data Tools
steps.description: Explore big data technologies like Spark and Hadoop.

steps.title: Java Core
steps.description: Master Java fundamentals, OOP, and collections.

steps.title: Spring Framework
steps.description: Learn Spring Core, Spring MVC, and dependency injection.

steps.title: Spring Boot
steps.description: Build RESTful APIs and microservices with Spring Boot.

steps.title: Microservices Architecture
steps.description: Understand microservices patterns and best practices.

steps.title: Cloud Deployment
steps.description: Deploy microservices on cloud platforms like AWS or Docker.

steps.title: JavaScript & Node.js
steps.description: Learn modern JavaScript and Node.js for backend development.

steps.title: Express.js
steps.description: Build RESTful APIs with Express.js and middleware.

steps.title: React
steps.description: Create dynamic frontends with React and component-based architecture.

steps.title: MongoDB
steps.description: Work with NoSQL databases using MongoDB and Mongoose.

steps.title: Full-Stack Integration
steps.description: Integrate MERN stack components for full-stack applications.
